Composed by Dharma Master Yuan

In the section on afflictions within the category of defiled dharmas, this chapter has seven sections: the meaning of the ten defilements, the meaning of the ten entanglements, the meaning of the ten hindrances, the meaning of the fourteen difficulties, the meaning of the sixteen selves, the meaning of the sixty-two views, and the meaning of the eighty-four thousand afflictions.

Distinguishing the sharp and dull, view and cultivation, 4. Distinguishing the differences in association, 5. Distinguishing the ninety-eight defilements, etc., 6. Distinguishing the differences in bondage through conditions, 7. Distinguishing the differences in the meaning of formation, 8. Generating karma and nourishing birth, 9. The sequence of arising from causes, 10. In the first aspect,
First, the general meaning is explained.
